projects.description: A Random Quote Generator, a program that displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button or when a timer ends. Also changes colors everytime a quote is generated.

Filter through a web page, to make a list of movies or students etc. (with more than 10 entries), better readable, showing just 10 of all users and add navigation links dynamicaly to the bottom. As an extra, it includes a search function.

Used JavaScript to enhance an interactive registration form for a fictional conference called "FullStack Conf". Added customized and conditional behavior and interactivity like show colors only when a design is selected, logic to prevent course collison at the same time, choose between different pay methods, validating user input and providing helpful error messages in real time.

projects.project_name: Object-Oriented Game Show App - Phrase Hunter
projects.description: A word or phrase guessing game based on the Wheel of Fortune Game Show
Request a JSON Object from an API Server to grab 12 random "employees", and use that data to build a prototype for an employee directory.
